about_the_game:
Game Introduction:
On this extraordinary night, can your home still provide you shelter? Are every sound you hear and every piece of information you see as simple and true as they seem?
"Do Not Look at the Moon" is a puzzle-solving adventure game themed around bizarre rules, where rules become the dividing line between survival and death. In this world, the moon is no longer a symbol of tranquility but a harbinger of ill omens. Players take on the role of an ordinary person unexpectedly caught up in this whirlwind of urban legends, facing sudden crises and intricate text message reminders as they strive to find a way to survive in this bizarre city.
Through engrossing storytelling, a thrilling choice-and-consequence system, and rich character interactions, the game creates a tense yet exploratory world of bizarre rules for players. Players must make difficult decisions between obeying or disobeying rules, each choice potentially impacting the character's fate and the direction of the story's outcome. Additionally, the game incorporates mechanics such as resource management and time travel, enhancing strategy and replayability.
In "Do Not Look at the Moon," players will delve into every corner of the city, unraveling the truth hidden beneath the surface and forging complex relationships with various mysterious characters. As the game progresses, players will gradually uncover the city's secrets and the even greater conspiracy lurking in the shadows. Ultimately, whether players can survive in this world filled with unknowns and dangers and find a way to escape will depend on your choices and actions.

Game Features:
In this eerie city, every step must be taken with caution, as every choice could be a matter of life and death. You will experience the myriad possibilities brought by "rules," which may guide you to safety or plunge you deeper into danger. But remember, there's no such thing as a free lunch; every decision you make will carry a corresponding cost, light or heavy, that cannot be avoided.

name: 城市怪谈之不要看月亮

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 城市怪谈之不要看月亮

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windowsXP,Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: 1Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 10 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windowsXP,Vista,7,8,10
  • Processor: 2Ghz or faster processor
  • Memory: 50 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 10GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: The moon, once serene, now portends doom. Air raid sirens blare, TVs warn: "Do not look at the moon." Your world's turned upside down. Messages flood in, all asking: How to survive in this world of bizarre rules?
